summary: VENT VALVE IS CRACKED ON FUEL TANK. DEALER LET ME KNOW THAT IT IS SUCH A COMMON PROBLEM THAT THEY HAVE NO TANKS AVAILABLE AND THEY ARE BACK ORDERED. SEEMS THEY SHOULD HAVE A SYSTEM IN PLACE TO REPLACE JUST THE VALVE NOT THE WHOLE TANK. WITH GAS LEAKING OUT THE VENT VALVE THERE IS CONCERN FOR A FIRE.
